import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { useLocation } from 'react-router-dom' import queryString from 'query-string' function Form() { const Location = useLocation() console.log(Location.search) const verifyToken= ()=> { const {token, id}= queryString.parse(Location.search) console.log(token," /n", id) } useEffect(() => { verifyToken() }, []) return (

Reset password

) } export default Form
